about_the_game:
What better way to take a little bit of Shoppe Keep 2 with you than to listen to the digital original soundtrack? Shoppe Keep 2 OST by Daniel Romeros.

Shoppe Keep 2 Digital OST Track Listing:

1) Battle Music
2) Into the Night
3) Main Theme
4) Original Theme Tribute
5) The Town
6) A Second Midday Shopping Spree
7) Biome Lands
8) Jotunn Theme
9) Main Theme (2019)
10) Savanah
11) Selutarr Theme
12) The Harbor
13) Woodland Green


All tracks are mp3 format. The Soundtrack can be accessed via the Steam music player.

As with the nature of Shoppe Keep 2, this soundtrack is a work in progress. At no extra cost to Shoppe Keep 2 OST owners, new tracks will be added to the soundtrack as the game evolves through Early Access.

name: Shoppe Keep 2 - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Take the weird and wonderful world of Customerania with you, as you listen to Shoppe Keep 2’s official soundtrack.
